医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
哈佛大学研究发现 PM2.5 空气污染与老年人心血管住院风险增加有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项新研究表明，长期接触细颗粒空气污染物 (PM2.5) 可能会增加老年人因各种心血管疾病住院的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Harvard-study-links-PM25-air-pollution-to-increased-risk-of-cardioangio-hospitalization-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Harvard-study-links-PM25-air-pollution-to-increased-risk-of-cardioangio-hospitalization-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eb19732-30d3-4110-9087-016f3427b029 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 09:12:53 -0500 Harvard study links PM2.5 air pollution to increased risk of cardiovascular hospitalization in seniors
研究人员发现逆转阿尔茨海默病中淀粉样蛋白斑块组装的机制北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校的研究人员开发了一种新的药物输送平台，该平台利用螺旋淀粉样纤维，旨在根据体温解开并释放药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Researchers-discover-mechanism-to-reverse-amyloid-plaque- assembly-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Researchers-discover-mechanism-to-reverse-amyloid-plaque- assembly-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54e44eee-4e1d-474a-acdd-f9e84e47bdac Thu, 22 Feb 2024 09:08:39 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism to reverse amyloid plaque assembly in Alzheimer's disease
SCIEX 的 Jose Castro-Perez 揭示了他们如何制定质谱新标准SCIEX 揭示了他们如何在 SLAS 2024 上制定质谱新标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Echoc2ae-MS2b-System-SCIEXe28099s-Jose-Castro-Perez-Reveals-How- Theyre-Setting-New-Standards-in-Mass-Spectrometry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Echoc2ae-MS2b-System-SCIEXe28099s-Jose-Castro-Perez-Reveals-How- Theyre-Setting-New-Standards-in-Mass-Spectrometry.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44ce2e3a-bf54-4e5e-a2f3-c7a7de5c9fd2 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 09:03:00 -0500 SCIEX’s Jose Castro-Perez Reveals How They're Setting New Standards in Mass Spectrometry
INTEGRA 的创新模块简化了磁珠纯化工作流程INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴地宣布推出 MAG 和 HEATMAG 模块，用于高效、自动化的磁珠纯化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/INTEGRAs-innovative-modules-simplify-magnet-bead-purification-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/INTEGRAs-innovative-modules-simplify-magic-bead-purification-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a3f3529-0132-4e20-8335-bbc63a57e8a5 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 08:44:00 -0500 INTEGRA's innovative modules simplify magnetic bead purification workflows
LabVantage 的专业服务组织三年内增长超过 80%，并向全球扩张资源、可用性和知识的全球扩展使 LabVantage 能够显着缩短实施时间并为世界各地的客户提供支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/LabVantagee28099s-Professional-Services-Organization-Grows-by-More-than-8025-in-Three-Years-and-Expands-Globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/LabVantagee28099s-Professional-Services-Organization-Grows-by-More-than-8025-in-Three-Years-and-Expands-Globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ae90e65-b1ca-46c9-9e35-35bab9800e39 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 08:35:00 -0500 LabVantage’s Professional Services Organization Grows by More than 80% in Three Years and Expands Globally
适当的血清维生素 D 水平可能对乳腺癌有保护作用维生素 D 对乳腺癌 (BC) 的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Proper-serum-levels-of-vitamin-D-may-have-a-protective-effect-against-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Proper-serum-levels-of-vitamin-D-may-have-a-protective-effect-against-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0037fa12-7128-4f14-b84d-a7d0007fe34b Thu, 22 Feb 2024 07:32:00 -0500 Proper serum levels of vitamin D may have a protective effect against breast cancer
绿茶不会降低患肺癌的风险饮用绿茶是否与降低肺癌风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Green-tea-does-not-lower-the-risk-of-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Green-tea-does-not-lower-the-risk-of-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aad1e694-ffda-4254-9812-79d153fd2a08 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 07:05:00 -0500 Green tea does not lower the risk of lung cancer
机器学习模型确定代谢综合征与哺乳之间的关联机器学习模型研究哺乳与代谢综合征风险的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Machine-learning-model-to-define-associations- Between-metabolic-syndrome-and-lactation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Machine-learning-model-to-define-associations- Between-metabolic-syndrome-and-lactation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9bc916d-18d6-498b-8e37-373ebb088a11 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:33:00 -0500 Machine learning model to determine associations between metabolic syndrome and lactation
检测阿尔茨海默病的简单血液测试可能会取代更具侵入性的诊断方法诊断阿尔茨海默病的简单血液测试很快可能会取代更具侵入性和昂贵的筛查方法，例如脊椎穿刺和脑部扫描。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Simple-blood-test-to-detect-Alzheimers-disease-may-replace-more-guarantee-diagnostic-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Simple-blood-test-to-detect-Alzheimers-disease-may-replace-more-guarantee-diagnostic-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3864de3f-6a59-4074-a5de-e3f77a691b08 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:22:46 -0500 Simple blood test to detect Alzheimer's disease may replace more invasive diagnostic methods
慢性艾滋病患者的肠道微生物组与过早衰老之间的联系被揭示Wistar 研究所的副教授 Mohamed Abdel-Mohsen 博士与他的实验室和合作者证明，病毒对肠道的损伤与过早的生物衰老之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Link- Between-gut-microbiome-and-premature-aging-unveiled-in-chronic-HIV-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Link- Between-gut-microbiome-and-premature-aging-unveiled-in-chronic-HIV-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fef9ab3e-a4bc-4982-a8b1-f69a7a77d780 Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:15:00 -0500 Link between gut microbiome and premature aging unveiled in chronic HIV patients
